transcript:
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Haan sir good evening.
Customer: Good evening good evening.
Executive: Ayush baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se ji bataiye.
Customer: Ji ji ji kya hua iska zoom meeting ka?
Executive: Sir actually na aaj to technical error chala subah se ek bhi video meeting connect hi nahi ho rahi hai. Isi wajah se maine aapko bola matlab wo click hi nahi ho raha us pe ha.
Customer: Sir hamare yaha bhai sahab pareshan ho rahe hai aaj lead
Executive: Main samajh raha hu sir nahi nahi dekho kal bhi maine aapko message kiya tha tabhi kal hi kar diya tha morning mein bhi ki jisse possible ho jaye wo abhi literally nahi hai warna sir khud batao main to khud hi chah raha hu sir video meeting ho jaye sari cheez ho.
Customer: Sir mujhe batao sir ek baar ek baar itne din ho gaye ek bhi lead hamare kaam ki nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main ek baar abhi portal aap system pe hi ho?
Customer: Ab system se thoda bahar aa gaya hu ki main zoom meeting mana kar diya thoda sa.
Executive: Haan wo zoom kyunki possible kyunki mujhe na ek wo puchna tha aap se ki aaj jo leads aaj aapne dekhi to hongi na leads sir?
Customer: Nahi aayi hai aaj.
Executive: Kis cheez ki aa rahi hai sir aap mujhe ye bataiye.
Customer: Pehle main note karta ja raha hu.
Customer: Ek bhi lead nahi hai aaj Saturday ke baad se to ek hi lead ek bhi lead nahi aayi hai.
Executive: Lead ek bhi lead nahi hai ki dusri category ki lead aa rahi hai ye keh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Sir lead aayi kya hai? Ab dekhiye sir ek minute.

Executive: Abhi ek minute pehle aayi hai sir ye wali dekhiye. 7 minute pehle aayi hai lead.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Ek second ruko.
Executive: Haan main aapko screenshot bhejta ja raha hu dekhiye.
Customer: Ek second ek second. Hmm. Main khol lo.

Customer: Ye sari concrete mixer machine hai.
Executive: Haan ye ready mix concrete mixer machine ki aayi hai ye kaam ka hai apna?
Customer: Ready mix concrete machine.
Executive: Haan. Main bhejta hu.
Customer: Theli hai ye.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir sir sir sir wo jo theli aap wahi main aap se puchne wala tha jo niche likh ke aa raha na wo viewed hai wire also viewed iska matlab hota hai jab bhi aap kabhi search karte ho na jaise mujhe ready mix concrete machine chahiye to IndiaMART kya karta hai suggestion bhi de deta hai ki kya aap ye bhi product dekh sakte ho jaise hi wo is product pe click karte hai to wo also viewed mein aa jata hai theek hai na sir wire also viewed.
Customer: Okay. Haan to wo cheez isse cheez to samajh aa
Executive: Ek cheez batao ye chhote chhote mixer machine hai yaha se hum West Bengal kaise bhejenge bhai jitni bhi machine hai usse char guna.
Customer: Ek cheez batao ye chhote chhote mixer machine hai yaha se hum West Bengal kaise bhejenge bhai jitni bhi machine hai usse char guna.
Executive: Jaise ye dekho aap hi ke area ki na ek tha ye dekho main aapko bheju ye lead aapko dikhi thi ki nahi sir?
Executive: Ye dekho ye concrete mixer ki aayi thi sir ab Ghaziabad ki.
Executive: Mobile concrete batching plant hai category batching plant ki thi aapki ye dekho.
Executive: Aur proper ye matlab basically calls jisne kahi hai reply bhi de rahe hai.
Executive: Ye wala lead dikha sir aapko?
Executive: Ek ye cement feeding machine matlab ye dikh rahi hai ki nahi sir sold out matlab ye portal mein aake hi hatati hai sir aapke.
Customer: Ye wali.
Customer: Ek cheez batao koi bhi ho maine aapko ek cheez maine pehle hi bataya tha ki ek cheez batao jab hum portal pe samne baithe hue hai paas lead na dekhe hue bhi ek minute ka ek second ka samay lagta hai by rate usme paas lead wo chali jaati hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya aapne wo ek kaam kariye ek second rukiye aap ek software download karo.
Customer: Jaise ye paas lead jaise paas lead wale hai hmm to isme se hum mujhe contact number nahi nikal sakte kya?
Executive: Nahi aap na inka ye kaam kiya karo jo bhi paas leads mein hota hai aap I am interested mark kar diya karo to usse hoga kya jaise main bata deta hu hota kya hai isme jaise for example jo paanch supplier ne connect kar liye inko theek hai for example agar inki deal nahi ho payi ya kuch waisa hua pehli baat to aapki wo us particular category ki mapping hoti rehti hai aur plus aapke pass is type ki by leads badhna start ho jati hai tabhi maine aapko last time bhi kaha tha ki aap I am interested mark kar diya karo isse humse miss ho jati hai.
Customer: Ab ek cheez ek cheez batao jaise main paas lead mein aaya hu ye concrete mixer hai hmm theek hai hmm feeding machine chalo Pune Pune se yaha kaun lega ise?
Executive: Nahi wo wo nahi sir matlab main samajh gaya wo system pe ho to chhote chhote mixer machine aa rahe hai.
Executive: Sir main har cheez ki nahi keh raha hu ki har ke liye paas lead aap jaise ek apna hot mix plant aaya apne pass ek lead dikh rahi hogi ek ghante pehle hai Panvel ki ab ye dekho capacity 60 TPH hai hai na finance loan requirement nahi hai kuch additional requirement was sand ke liye business use chahiye ye may be hamare liye useful ho sakta hai.
Executive: Matlab aisa main nahi keh raha hu ki sir aapki sari ki sari paas leads useful hongi.
Customer: Jo cheez jo cheez out sold out ho chuki hai matlab kisi aur ne contact kar rakha hai inse.
Executive: Ji matlab ki kya hota kya hai sir jaise hi lead aati hai jo first five supplier is pe connect karega wo automatically sir wo expired ya sold out dikh jati hai aapki.
Customer: Hamesha ek second ek second ka samay nahi milta hamare pass show hi nahi hota paas lead mein turant chali jati hai.
Executive: Show nahi ho rahi hai sir matlab aisa aap aaj pure din system pe hi the kya sir ya phone mein phone mein application download kiya aapne?
Customer: Aap ek software
Executive: Ek software aap phone mein bhi kar lijiye sir kyunki aapke jaise kahin bahar ho meeting pe sari cheeze ho to aap dekhte to rahoge kyunki aapke alawa koi aur dekhta is tarah se portal koi dekhta hai kya?
Customer: Iska application yahi aayega same aayega IndiaMART.
Executive: Sir aayega sir aap hi ka number lagega aur aap hi ka number main hai na sir isme primary wala.
Customer: IndiaMART ke naam se hi aayega na?
Executive: Haan IndiaMART aap usme application download kar lo aur usme apna number se hi registration kyunki yahi number aapka main hai jis number pe maine aapko call kiya hai isse karoge aapke mein application download ho jayega to easy ho jayega matlab notification aapke mail aapke mail to login hoga aapke phone mein jo ye mail
Customer: ID hai. Hmm hmm.
Executive: To wo usse kya hoga aapke pass notification jaise hi aayega na aap click karoge us notification se to wo ho jayega. Abhi kya hota hai ki sir main bhi samajhta hu sir aapke pass dekho kafi kaam hote hai aap field pe bhi jaate ho sari cheeze to nahi ho sakta ki sir aap pure time aap system ke samne baithe aur aapki ye jo category hai aisi hai ki sir isme order value bahut high hoti hai hai na to limited customers aata hai agar hum usko nahi karenge to dusra customer wo kar lega ye cheez. Aap mujhe ek cheez aur bataiye chaliye isme to main sir aur isme karta hu aur aapko kuch kal na kal bhi nahi abhi main shayad aapko thodi der baad kuch keywords bhejunga aap mujhe puch ke bataiyega ki hum ye add kar sakte hai ki nahi apne isme aapke particular category ke regarding.
Customer: Theek theek theek.
Executive: Aur ek cheez aur main bata deta hu.
Executive: Ek second rukiye bas.
Executive: Inquiry aa rahi hai sir wo bhi bekar hai kya sir?
Customer: Ye mixer machine ki chhoti chhoti machines aa rahi hai jo Maharashtra jani Maharashtra tak ka kharcha itna baith ja jitne ki machine nahi hai na.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with Zoom meetings.

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Leads are not useful, costly transportation.



Resolution:

- Executive explained technical error with Zoom meetings.

- Executive shared screenshots of recent leads.

- Explained the 'viewed' status on IndiaMART.

- Suggested marking 'I am interested' on past leads.

- Suggested downloading the IndiaMART application.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send keywords for category improvement.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, zoom meeting, application, past leads
